entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TextDocument.Folders is always empty for additional files #65589
  • Side effects of implicit Range indexer on a struct type are not propagated to the receiver #65586
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers warns that I should be using version 7.0.0; but there isn't a release version of 7.0.0 yet #65581
  • `SyntaxTree.GetChanges()` returns non-deterministic results #65580
  • `dotnet_style_prefer_is_null_check_over_reference_equality_method` not respected by other features #65577

Closed

  • BadImageFormatException with virtual static interface properties #65584
  • CA1822 on implicit implementation of a static interface member #65585
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33122.497 #65578
  • VerifyAllCodeStyleFixersAreSupportedByCodeCleanup tests are failing #65566
    17.5
  • Debug-only test failures in ExternalDiagnosticUpdateSourceTests #65563

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65587
    Area-Compilers
  • Add capability to request fine grained DiagnosticKinds to diagnostic analyzer service #65583
    Area-Analyzers
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider delegate default parameter values and `params` in symbol matcher #65579
    Area-Compilers
  • Port #65083 to release/dev17.4 branch #65576
    Area-Analyzers, OnDeckForServicing

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65569
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Compress indices before storing in persistence service #65588
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Prevent null ref in package disposal #65590
    Area-IDE, Next
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65526
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add asserts for debug only test failures and fix tests #65565
    Test, Tenet-Reliability, Next
  • Move to multi-column primary keys for our sqlite database. #65553
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make sure the container syntax node is not GlobalStatements #65570
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Increase CodeCleanUp test value #65575
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update to latest version of protocol with new pull diagnostic types #65514
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Merge pull request #63858 from CyrusNajmabadi/pullDiags" #65538
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Only complete () if constructor is accessible #65542
    Area-IDE
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE
  • Emit `ParamArrayAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65533
    Area-Compilers
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` tests from the test plan review #65458
    Area-Compilers
  • Out arguments do not contribute val escape #64784
    Area-Compilers
